solution_line_template: There are {bottle_liters}*{ml_per_liter} ml = <<{bottle_liters}*{ml_per_liter}={bottle_ml}>>{bottle_ml} ml in a {bottle_liters}-liter bottle of soda.
A 2-liter bottle of soda lasts {bottle_ml}/{daily_consumption_ml} = <<{bottle_ml}/{daily_consumption_ml}={days_last}>>{days_last} days.
